column1: Yahweh himself is who goes before you. He will be with you. He will not fail you nor forsake you. Don’t be afraid. Don’t be discouraged.
Haven’t I commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Don’t be afraid. Don’t be dismayed, for Yahweh your God is with you wherever you go.
Offer the sacrifices of righteousness. Put your trust in Yahweh.
As for me, I said in my haste, “I am cut off from before your eyes.” Nevertheless you heard the voice of my petitions when I cried to you.
Therefore we won’t be afraid, though the earth changes, though the mountains are shaken into the heart of the seas;
When I am afraid, I will put my trust in you.
You shall not be afraid of the terror by night, nor of the arrow that flies by day, nor of the pestilence that walks in darkness, nor of the destruction that wastes at noonday.
Yahweh will keep you from all evil. He will keep your soul.
In the way of righteousness is life; in its path there is no death.
You will keep whoever’s mind is steadfast in perfect peace, because he trusts in you.
Don’t you be afraid, for I am with you. Don’t be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you. Yes, I will help you. Yes, I will uphold you with the right hand of my righteousness.
Heal me, O Yahweh, and I will be healed. Save me, and I will be saved; for you are my praise.
You shall call on me, and you shall go and pray to me, and I will listen to you. You shall seek me and find me, when you search for me with all your heart.
He said to them, “Why are you so afraid? How is it that you have no faith?”
Don’t let your heart be troubled. Believe in God. Believe also in me.
